description_long: As you pass through the door, a golden heraldic crest appears on the door behind you.
It appears this room is protected by some sort of magical seal.
A tranquil fountain sits in the center of the room, lit not by torches, but candles placed delicately about its rim.
The usual dusty floor of the dungeon has turned instead to dirt, and a few tufts of grass poke up from it.
A very different sight from the rest of the rooms, this room has a somewhat calming presence to it.
This may be a good place to take a rest, should the need arise.

description_dark: It's so dark you can't see your hand in front of your face.

It doesn't seem usual to find a sitting room in a place like this.

description_long: As you pass through the door, a golden heraldic crest appears on the door behind you.
It appears this room is protected by some sort of magical seal.
This room seems a bit unusual. Brightly lit hundreds of tiny glowing wisps, the ground is densely covered with flowers.
Along the sides are several old pots and raised beds filled with ornamental flowers.
Given the overgrown nature of this place, it seems like this place hasn't been cultivated for quite some time.
Along the wall hangs a large rope hammock.
This may be a good place to take a rest, should the need arise.
